DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and feasibility of active video gaming with regard to the promotion of physical activity and motor learning in children with cancer. Experienced fatigue, body mass index and the development of metabolic risk factors during treatment are also examined.
DOC.brief_title: Active Video Games to Promote Physical Activity in Children With Cancer
DOC.criteria: cancer diagnose treated with Vincristine in Turku University Hospital or Tampere University Hospital other diseases limiting functional ability not able to communicate
